alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Goochland; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Goochland, northwestern Henrico and southeastern Hanover Counties and the City of Richmond through 515 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tuckahoe, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Ashland, Randolph Macon College, Bon Air, Virginia Union University, Tuckahoe, University Of Richmond, Mechanicsville, Hanover, Manakin, East Highland Park, Glen Allen, Kings Dominion, Laurel, Studley, Lakeside, Wyndham, Elmont, Solomons Store and Chamberlayne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Goochland; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
